meanings.sent1: She is dualising the colors of the painting.
meanings.sent2: The mirror is dualising the image.
meanings.sent3: The twins are dualising their outfits for the party.
meanings.sent4: The river seems to be dualising as it splits into two streams.
meanings.sent5: The scientist is dualising the properties of the new material.

meanings.sent1: His actions are dualising his words.
meanings.sent2: The debate is dualising the opinions of the audience.
meanings.sent3: The cat is dualising its playful and lazy sides.
meanings.sent4: The storm is dualising the calmness of the sea.
meanings.sent5: The politician is dualising his promises with his actions.
